qas.question: How many pubs were part of the CAMRA survey?
According to CAMRA, how many pubs in Britain possess classic snugs?

context: CAMRA have surveyed the <a0_0>50,000<a0_0/> pubs in Britain and they believe that there are <a1_0>very few<a1_0/> pubs that still have classic snugs. These are on a historic interiors list in order that they can be preserved.
